basics.name: Dhanesh Neela Mana
basics.summary: I am a full-stack engineer, passionate about building reliable software systems while enabling my collegues to fulfill their roles effectively. I have architected and built an instant messaging service using MQTT;Scalable REST APIs;Data driven web applications;Authentication services using OAuth 2.0 specifications

work.summary: Web based productivity tools for scientist working in Neuroscience/Brain Research.
highlights: Currently leading the front end team
Designed and developed many small(sub) applications to meet various data access and visualization needs for scientist.
Used Typescript, React, Sparql, JSON-LD and Elastic search

work.summary: I have build scalable web applications with ReactJS and Java Spring frame work
highlights: Mentor for summer interns for summer of 2018.
Built a set of features in ReactJS/Spring API for an internal analytics tool.

work.company: Front Rush LLC, Yardly, United States
work.summary: 60%  Senior Software Engineer, 20% Chief Architect, 20% Engineering Manager
highlights: Architected a messaging service that connects user base of one product with the user base of another product. Used MQTT/Mosquito,Cassandra, Ruby Grape API, Reactjs.
Coordinated interview process for hiring  Software Engineers.
Worked with the Chef Product Officer on various third party integrations to the product ecosystem.
Lead two teams (one offshore) and coordinated development activities across time zones.
Lead a long term project migrating a legacy Asp.net application to ruby on rails.
Working with CPO and VP on strategic and architectural planning, implementation of new technology, designing and implementing system solutions to meet product road map.

work.company: Front Rush LLC, Yardly, United States
highlights: Built two data driven web applications using ruby on rails/postgres/redis/solr
Helped scale rails applications from zero to one hundred thousand users
Working closely with the Chief Product Officer, architected a product ecosystem with three products connected through APIs
Designed, Developed and Maintained web applications on C#/Asp.net 2.0 and 4.0
Designed an automated testing suite based on WatiN testing platform
